org.taverna.server.master.factories

Interface RunFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigurableRunFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRemoteRunFactory, ForkRunFactory, IdAwareForkRunFactory, RunFactoryConfiguration

    public interface RunFactory
    How to construct a Taverna Server Workflow Run.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TavernaRun create(UsernamePrincipal creator, Workflow workflow)
      Make a Taverna Server workflow run that is bound to a particular user (the "creator") and able to run a particular workflow.
      boolean isAllowingRunsToStart()
      Check whether the factory is permitting runs to actually start operating.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        TavernaRun create(UsernamePrincipal creator,
                  Workflow workflow)
           throws NoCreateException
        Make a Taverna Server workflow run that is bound to a particular user (the "creator") and able to run a particular workflow.
        Parameters:
        creator - The user creating the workflow instance.
        workflow - The workflow to instantiate
        Returns:
        An object representing the run.
        Throws:
        NoCreateException - On failure.

      • isAllowingRunsToStart

        boolean isAllowingRunsToStart()
        Check whether the factory is permitting runs to actually start operating.
        Returns:
        Whether a run should start.
